articles.description: A fireball that lit up the sky over the United Kingdom and Northern Europe on February 28 was an extremely rare type of meteorite. Fragments of the space rock could provide answers to questions about the early history of the solar system and life on Earth.
articles.title: Rare meteorite that fell on UK driveway may contain 'ingredients for life' - CNN

articles.description: Neanderthal fossils from a cave in Belgium believed to belong to the last survivors of their species ever discovered in Europe are thousands of years older than once thought, a new study said on Monday (Mar 8).
articles.title: Neanderthals disappeared from Europe earlier than thought, says study - CNA
